hero.subtext: At Nandeep's Coffee House, We only brew the freshest coffee from all around the world. We also serve pastries such as cupcakes and brownies.

about.header: Welcome to the Nandeep's Coffee House
about.subtext: Nandeep's Coffee House offers a unique coffee house environment unlike any other in Macon. We are not only a place to drop in and get your morning cup of coffee (although you are more than welcome to do that), we are a place where you can sit down and enjoy that tailor-made cup of coffee. If you need to work, we have a seating area created specifically for you.
